components.title: Days Sales Outstanding [Days] - Calculation starting from 'Send Invoice'

meta.expressionLhs: CASE WHEN PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) >= 0.0 AND PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) <= 100.0 THEN 'a) 0 - 100€' WHEN PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) > 100.0 AND PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) <= 1000.0 THEN 'b) 100 - 1.000€' WHEN PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) > 1000.0 AND PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) <= 5000.0 THEN 'c) 1.000 - 5.000€' WHEN PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) > 5000.0 AND PU_SUM ( "BKPF" , "BSEG"."WRBTR" ) <= 10000.0 THEN 'd) 5.000 - 10.000€' ELSE 'e) > 10.000€' END AS "#{WRBTR}"

axis0.name: #{WRBTR}
axis0.text:
CASE WHEN PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") >= 0.0 AND PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") <= 100.0 THEN 'a) 0 - 100€'
    WHEN PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") > 100.0 AND PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") <= 1000.0 THEN 'b) 100 - 1.000€'
    WHEN PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") > 1000.0 AND PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") <= 5000.0 THEN 'c) 1.000 - 5.000€'
    WHEN PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") > 5000.0 AND PU_SUM("BKPF","BSEG"."WRBTR") <= 10000.0 THEN 'd) 5.000 - 10.000€'
    ELSE 'e) > 10.000€' END
